summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SMK3 Audit application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend has authentication session management issues but core UI components and navigation work correctly.

integration_issues.issue: User sessions not persisting properly between page navigations, causing 401 errors

passed_tests: User registration for all roles (admin, auditor, auditee)
Clauses CRUD operations with knowledge base
AI audit analysis using Gemini 2.0 Flash (score: 80.0, status: Sesuai)
UI component rendering with proper data-testid attributes
Auth page registration and login forms
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication session persistence issue. Users can register and login successfully, but sessions don't persist properly during navigation, causing 401 errors on subsequent API calls.
